<<<<<<< HEAD
The Salamanca doctor's farewel, or, Titus's exaltation to the pillory, upon his conviction of perjury a ballad, to the tune of Packingtons pound.
1 broadside.
Printed for G.C. and sold by Randal Taylor ..., [London] : 1685.
In verse. Place of publication suggested by Wing. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
